name: M5Catode
description: Virtual cat pet (Catode32 port) for M5StickC Plus2
author: coreymillia
features: Virtual cat pet with animated sprites
Auto-triggered cat behaviors (sleeping, playing, stretching, zoomies, etc.)
Care actions: feed, pet, kiss, groom, toys
Stat decay and persistence across reboots
Environment settings: time of day, weather, season, moon phase
Dynamic sky rendering reacts to environment
Stats screen with all pet stats
notes: Pet stats decay over time - remember to feed and care for your cat
Stats and environment settings persist across reboots
Based on the Catode32 MicroPython project by mhv75
